desc: Barbers in London - Huckle The Barber. No gimmicks, independent barbers in London of the highest quality with no pretence.

layout.text: Renowned for its welcoming surroundings and authentic experience, Huckle The Barber offers a range of traditional services in a relaxed, modern setting. With stores in the heart of Shoreditch and Holborn, Huckle The Barber is recognised for its roster of skilled barbers and easy hospitality.
